ygData.subject: Wake up
ygData.msgSnippet: Black Aracnia said nothing as she made her way to Quickstrike. She had missed him so much...and now with Quasar missing, she was alone. Her family gone.

Subject: Wake up
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

From: JP3884@...

    Black Aracnia said nothing as she made her way to Quickstrike. She had 
missed him so much...and now with Quasar missing, she was alone. Her family 
gone. Quickstrike sounded angry on the comm...she hoped he was ok.
    As looked at her scans, he was around the corner. She transformed into 
beast mode, and scurried as fast as she could. Then, she saw him. 
"Quickstrike!"

    Ominous laughed. "Ah, youre awake my sweet. Good. Now I must teach you 
about our people. Sit up, and watch." 
    In front of Quasar was a screen, and it flashed with hundreds of images a 
seconed. Pictures of mayhem, carnage, and death. This was all a form of 
hypnotism. He hoped this would break her. Make her obey him.
